page.title: 07LORNA COLLIN'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: In the morning my mum wakes me up.I get dressed and go down for my breakfast of cornflakes. I pack my bag and go for my friend Paula. Then we walk to school. The bell rings at 9 o'clock. Then we do our mental arithmetic and language. Our playtime bell rings at 10:35am. Our dinnertime bell rings at 12:25pm and our hometime one rings at 3:20pm.Our project is the Domesday Project.We go for long walks, but we have to be finished all our other work first.After school I do my homework, then I watch television. When I've had my supper, I go out to play skipping with my friends.When I come back in, I usually just go to my bed at about 9 o'clock.
